line_1: Bestow a tear of kind compassion
line_2: And, ah! forgive a fatal passion,

line_1: Not that he blush'd to shew compassion, —
line_2: It chanc'd that year to be the fashion.
'Tis very severe to make Beauty petition:

line_1: But when dull speakers strive to move compassion,
line_2: I pity their poor hearers, not the nation:
